Package reskue.task

Class TaskService

java.lang.Object
kueres.eventbus.EventSubscriber
kueres.base.BaseService<E,​R>
reskue.ReskueService<TaskEntity,​TaskRepository>
reskue.task.TaskService
@Service
public class TaskService
extends ReskueService<TaskEntity,​TaskRepository>
The TaskService provides services needed by the TaskController.
Since:
Mar 25, 2021
Version:
1.0
Author:
Jan Strassburg, jan.strassburg@student.kit.edu
